General.Name: Gigalane Co Ltd
General.Description: GigaLane Co., Ltd. primarily manufactures and sells semiconductor equipment in South Korea and internationally. The company offers radio frequency (RF) components, including RF connectors, adapters, cables, cable designers, mobile coax micro plugs and jacks, board connectors, end-launch connectors, and cal-kits for mobile and wireless devices, 5G network infrastructure, test and measurements, and defense and aerospace industries. The company also involved in the trading of semiconductor equipment, which consists LED, DRIE, and ICP etcher, as well as nano imprinters. GigaLane Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
